name: Doctor Rotson
descriptions: Doctor Rotson is a dead ghoulified doctor found in Hell's Motel within the Mesquite Mountains crater in 2281.

Rotson was a doctor who made his home and livelihood in Hell's Motel in the western Mojave Wasteland, complete with an independent fungus farm, a personal Mister Handy and even a distillery. He was killed by unknown means, potentially by his crazed robotic assistant.
Dr. Rotson's remains appear only in Fallout: New Vegas.
